title: New release would help for homebrew

content.raw: The latest tag is 0.1.0, which was when this package used ign-math2, but now the default branch uses ign-math3. The homebrew formula is used both for installing the software and for resolving dependencies for the default branch PR testing. Currently the [ignition-common formula](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/blob/master/ignition-common.rb) depends on `ignition-math3` so that the default branch jenkins jobs will work, but building the 0.1.0 version of the formula doesn't work. It would be helpful for our homebrew package maintenance if we could make a 0.2.0 release that depends on `ign-math3`. Are there any objections?
